title: Which Country Is Most Important To Racing? -- /SHAKEDOWN
description: Leo Parente and ShakeDown decide the holidays are the best time for a fight [you know what happens when you go home]. So, let's discuss which country is most important to racing. Let's leave the definition pretty broad. Not limiting your criteria to most wins, best drivers, or most racecars. Just think if that country's contributions to racing were NOT there, how much would it matter?  And when you post your country choice in the comments below, give a bit of your reasoning please.

asset.title: Which Country Is Most Important To Racing? -- /SHAKEDOWN
asset.description:
Leo Parente and ShakeDown decide the holidays are the best time for a fight [you know what happens when you go home]. So, let's discuss which country is most important to racing. Let's leave the definition pretty broad. Not limiting your criteria to most wins, best drivers, or most racecars. Just think if that country's contributions to racing were NOT there, how much would it matter?  And when you post your country choice in the comments below, give a bit of your reasoning please.
